page.title: 09The First And Last Inn
page.content: {The First and Last Inn}is very famous It is said to be about 700 years old. It is unique in that both sides of its swinging Inn sign are different. On one side{The First Inn}and on the other side{The Last Inn}in{England. Now the manager of{The First and Last is{Derek Angove. The First and Last} was first built to house the monks who built{St.Senan Church.}It became an Inn about 300 years ago. Smugglers and wreckers used it often for hiding stolen goods. One of the tunnels went across the road to the{manor house.}It was used for listening to the farmers conversations about prices at the market so that the owner could cheat them out of their money. (At the moment the tunnels are sealed off). There are other tunnels leading to the cliffs.{The First and Last}is very popular and worth a visit.
